body:
Speaking of rain and its relationship to cloud-computing > [http://halfblog.net/2011/11/29/the-telegraph-thought-councillor-tho...](http://halfblog.net/2011/11/29/the-telegraph-thought-councillor-thought-cloud-computing-depended-on-rainy-weather/)

After all these years it still makes me laugh loud. I feel bad for the guy.
